modName: Lie to Degaine about Dibella Statue
summary: Ever wondered why Degaine (the beggar in Markarth) only wants the dibella statue in the temple and not a dibella statue, you find throughout the game? How does he know the difference whether you stole it out of the temple or not. This mod adds the possibility to lie to Degaine and give him any Dibella Statue as long you have the speech skill to sel
descriptionHtml:
Ever wondered why Degaine (the beggar in Markarth) only wants the dibella statue in the temple and not a dibella statue, you find throughout the game? How does he know the difference whether you stole it out of the temple or not. This mod adds the possibility to lie to Degaine and give him any Dibella Statue as long you have the speech skill to sell this to him (otherwise the option will not show up).

Installation
------------
Just place the esp in the data folder and enable it with Skyrim Launcher. May not be compatible with NMM.

Known issues
------------
You will need to have enough speechcraft skill to be able to lie about the origins of the statue.

files.name: T01DegaineLieAboutStatue Final version
files.changelogHtml:
Complete remake, should fix bugs in previous versions such as :
- missing sound file
- option to lie with low speechcraft skill didn't show due mistake on the speechcraft condition (was running on Degaine not on the player)
- normal tg01degainfavor quest was bugged
